location.address: The Small Pool, Life Leisure Hazel Grove, SK7 5JW
location.parking: Free parking in the car park
location.mapsUrl: https://maps.apple.com/?address=Life Leisure Hazel Grove, Jacksons Ln, Hazel Grove, Stockport SK7 5JW

bus.description: Connects Glossop to Stepping Hill Hospital

train.connections: Direct trains to/from Manchester Piccadilly, Stockport, and Buxton

details.description: A fun swim and splash session for babies and friendly parents. While lifeguards are present, this is not an organised session or swimming lesson.

faq.q: Is this an organised swimming session?
faq.a: No, this is a relaxed swimming session watched over by lifeguards. We're not swimming teachers.
Armbands aren't required but are recommended for young children.

faq.q: What are the changing facilities like?
faq.a: Baby change facilities available in the small pool changing rooms. There's dedicated space for buggies too.
The pool is 1m deep and pool floats are provided.
It's recommended to arrive at 14:30 to start getting changed for the 14:45 session.
The small pool is maintained at 29°C (standard temperature) - much warmer than the main pool. Still, watch your little one's comfort as some prefer it warmer.

faq.q: Is this affiliated with Life Leisure?
faq.a: No, this is not endorsed, affiliated or supported in any way by Life Leisure. It's an entirely informal gathering organised by parents.

faq.q: What do I need for the lockers?
faq.a: Padlocks are required but can be bought at reception (£3). Many leave lockers unlocked without issues, but we recommend securing valuables.
